sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSASSISTLIST where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

insert into LNSASSISTLIST (BRC, ACCTNO, TXNSEQ, TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, CUSTOMID, CCY, FEETYPE, CDFLAG, TRANAMT, BAL, ACCTSTAT, ORDNU, TRANCODE, MEMOCODE, MEMONAME, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5, RESERV6, TUNNELDATA, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME ) values (:brc, :acctno, :txnseq, :trandate, :serseqno, :customid, :ccy, :feetype, :cdflag, :tranamt, :bal, :acctstat, :ordnu, :trancode, :memocode, :memoname, :reserv1, :reserv2, :reserv3, :reserv4, :reserv5, :reserv6, :tunneldata, current timestamp, current timestamp )

update LNSASSISTLIST set TRANDATE = :trandate, SERSEQNO = :serseqno, CUSTOMID = :customid, CCY = :ccy, FEETYPE = :feetype, CDFLAG = :cdflag, TRANAMT = :tranamt, BAL = :bal, ACCTSTAT = :acctstat, ORDNU = :ordnu, TRANCODE = :trancode, MEMOCODE = :memocode, MEMONAME = :memoname, RESERV1 = :reserv1, RESERV2 = :reserv2, RESERV3 = :reserv3, RESERV4 = :reserv4, RESERV5 = :reserv5, RESERV6 = :reserv6, TUNNELDATA = :tunneldata, CREATETIME = :createtime, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

select BRC, ACCTNO, TXNSEQ, TRANDATE, SERSEQNO, CUSTOMID, CCY, FEETYPE, CDFLAG, TRANAMT, BAL, ACCTSTAT, ORDNU, TRANCODE, MEMOCODE, MEMONAME, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5, RESERV6, TUNNELDATA, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME from LNSASSISTLIST where BRC = :brc and ACCTNO = :acctno and TXNSEQ = :txnseq
